name: SVGPathElement.pathLength
description: The SVGPathElement.pathLength property reflects the pathLength attribute and returns the total length of the path, in user units.

refs.name: Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition)
refs.description: The definition of 'SVGPathElement.pathLength' in the 'Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) 1.1 (Second Edition)' specification.
